attributes.action: Stop to Media Portraying all Teenagers in the UK as Trouble Makers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, the News Media is portraying all Teenagers ink the UK as Murderers, Binge drinkers, Drug Dealers and general Trouble Makers. This is not the Case at all. It is only small, Select Groups in the UK that are like this. The Media Know this, yet they still portray all Teenagers to be like this. The Media's View on this is increasing tensions around the UK and many people are beginning to turn round to this fake media's view. This Petition is Aimed at Stopping this by Stopping the Media from doing this.

rejection.details: Freedom of the press is part of a democratic society.  You might have more success by writing to your local newspaper.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
